questions.title: Reverse a String
questions.description: Write a function that reverses a string. The input is given as a string.

questions.title: Two Sum
questions.description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers in the array that add up to target.

questions.title: FizzBuzz
questions.description: Write a program that outputs the string representation of numbers from 1 to n. For multiples of three output 'Fizz', for multiples of five output 'Buzz', for multiples of both output 'FizzBuzz'.
